class_notes:
You must have permission to enroll in-person. 
(Same as CPLT 389W 2)  "Practices of Reading" | Whether we read for pleasure or intellectual enrichment, to acquire knowledge or as a professional activity, at the heart of our engagement with literature is the practice of reading. Reading is also the method that most commonly defines the study of literature as a discipline.
course_description: Literary topics vary. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
